scene_description: A worker in a warehouse, wearing a high-visibility vest and gloves, attempts to manually lift a heavy bag from a pallet stacked with similar bags. He struggles, grunts, and then clutches his lower back in pain, indicating an injury. A hand truck is visible nearby.
safety_response: Immediately assess the injured worker for medical attention. Reinforce proper lifting techniques, emphasizing the use of mechanical aids like hand trucks or forklifts for heavy loads. Conduct a safety briefing on manual handling and ergonomic practices to prevent future injuries.
